T04nagmmk_u:0: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpy ahetutaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:1: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kva cana ke cana // MMK_1.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:3: tathaivādhipateyaṃ ca pratyayo nāsti pañcamaḥ // MMK_1.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:4: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:5: avidyamāne svabhāve parabhāvo na vidyate // MMK_1.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:7: pratyayā nākriyāvantaḥ kriyāvantaś ca santy uta // MMK_1.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:9: yāvan notpadyata ime tāvan nāpratyayāḥ katham // MMK_1.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:11: asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataś ca pratyayena kim // MMK_1.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:12: na san nāsan na sad asan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
T04nagmmk_u:13: kathaṃ nirvartako hetur evaṃ sati hi yujyate // MMK_1.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:15: athānārambaṇe dharme kuta ārambaṇaṃ punaḥ // MMK_1.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:17: nānantaram ato yuktaṃ niruddhe pratyayaś ca kaḥ // MMK_1.9 //
T04nagmmk_u:18: bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ na sattā vidyate yataḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:19: satīdam asmin bhavatīty etan naivopapadyate // MMK_1.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:20: na ca vyastasamasteṣu pratyayeṣvasti tat phalam /
T04nagmmk_u:21: pratyayebhyaḥ kathaṃ tac ca bhaven na pratyayeṣu yat // MMK_1.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:22: athāsad api tat tebhyaḥ pratyayebhyaḥ pravartate /
T04nagmmk_u:28: gataṃ na gamyate tāvad agataṃ naiva gamyate /
T04nagmmk_u:30: ceṣṭā yatra gatis tatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:31: na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatis tataḥ // MMK_2.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:35: ṛte gater gamyamānaṃ gamyamānaṃ hi gamyate // MMK_2.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:37: yena tad gamyamānaṃ ca yac cātra gamanaṃ punaḥ // MMK_2.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:39: gantāraṃ hi tiraskṛtya gamanaṃ nopapadyate // MMK_2.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:41: gamane 'sati gantātha kuta eva bhaviṣyati // MMK_2.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:42: gantā na gacchati tāvad agantā naiva gacchati /
T04nagmmk_u:43: anyo gantur agantuś ca kas tṛtīyo 'tha gacchati // MMK_2.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:45: gamanena vinā gantā yadā naivopapadyate // MMK_2.9 //
T04nagmmk_u:46: pakṣo gantā gacchatīti yasya tasya prasajyate /
T04nagmmk_u:47: gamanena vinā gantā gantur gamanam icchataḥ // MMK_2.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:48: gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati /
T04nagmmk_u:49: ganteti cājyate yena gantā san yac ca gacchati // MMK_2.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:51: nārabhyate gamyamāne gantum ārabhyate kuha // MMK_2.12 //
T04nagmmk_u:52: na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhād gamyamānaṃ na vā gatam /
T04nagmmk_u:53: yatrārabhyeta gamanam agate gamanaṃ kutaḥ // MMK_2.13 //
T04nagmmk_u:54: gataṃ kiṃ gamyamānaṃ kim agataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate /
T04nagmmk_u:56: gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvad agantā naiva tiṣṭhati /
T04nagmmk_u:57: anyo gantur agantuś ca kas tṛtīyo 'tha tiṣṭhati // MMK_2.15 //
T04nagmmk_u:59: gamanena vinā gantā yadā naivopapadyate // MMK_2.16 //
T04nagmmk_u:60: na tiṣṭhati gamyamānān na gatān nāgatād api /
T04nagmmk_u:61: gamanaṃ saṃpravṛttiś ca nivṛttiś ca gateḥ samā // MMK_2.17 //
T04nagmmk_u:62: yad eva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate /
T04nagmmk_u:63: anya eva punar gantā gater iti na yujyate // MMK_2.18 //
T04nagmmk_u:64: yad eva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhaved yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:65: ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca // MMK_2.19 //
T04nagmmk_u:66: anya eva punar gantā gater yadi vikalpyate /
T04nagmmk_u:67: gamanaṃ syād ṛte gantur gantā syād gamanād ṛte // MMK_2.20 //
T04nagmmk_u:68: ekībhāvena vā siddhir nānābhāvena vā yayoḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:69: na vidyate tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // MMK_2.21 //
T04nagmmk_u:70: gatyā yayājyate gantā gatiṃ tāṃ sa na gacchati /
T04nagmmk_u:71: yasmān na gatipūrvo 'sti kaścid kiṃcid dhi gacchati // MMK_2.22 //
T04nagmmk_u:72: gatyā yayājyate gantā tato 'nyāṃ sa na gacchati /
T04nagmmk_u:73: gatī dve nopapadyete yasmād eke tu gantari // MMK_2.23 //
T04nagmmk_u:74: sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati /
T04nagmmk_u:75: nāsadbhūto 'pi gamanaṃ triprakāraṃ sa gacchati // MMK_2.24 //
T04nagmmk_u:78: darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:79: indriyāṇi ṣaḍ eteṣāṃ draṣṭavyādīni gocaraḥ // MMK_3.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:80: svam ātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tat tam eva na paśyati /
T04nagmmk_u:81: na paśyati yad ātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tat parān // MMK_3.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:84: nāpaśyamānaṃ bhavati yadā kiṃ cana darśanam /
T04nagmmk_u:85: darśanaṃ paśyatīty evaṃ katham etat tu yujyate // MMK_3.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:86: paśyati darśanaṃ naiva naiva paśyaty adarśanam /
T04nagmmk_u:87: vyākhyāto darśanenaiva draṣṭā cāpy avagamyatām // MMK_3.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:88: draṣṭā nāsty atiraskṛtya tiraskṛtya ca darśanam /
T04nagmmk_u:89: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ caiva draṣṭary asati te kutaḥ // MMK_3.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:93: nāstīty upādānādīni bhaviṣyanti punaḥ katham // MMK_3.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:94: vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:97: rūpeṇāpi na nirmuktaṃ dṛśyate rūpakāraṇam // MMK_4.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:99: āhetukaṃ na cāsty arthaḥ kaścid āhetukaḥ kva cit // MMK_4.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:100: rūpeṇa tu vinirmuktaṃ yadi syād rūpakāraṇam /
T04nagmmk_u:101: akāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ syād nāsty akāryaṃ ca kāraṇam // MMK_4.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:102: rūpe saty eva rūpasya kāraṇaṃ nopapadyate /
T04nagmmk_u:103: rūpe 'saty eva rūpasya kāraṇaṃ nopapadyate // MMK_4.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:105: tasmād rūpagatān kāṃścin na vikalpān vikalpayet // MMK_4.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:106: na kāraṇasya sadṛśaṃ kāryam ity upapadyate /
T04nagmmk_u:107: na kāraṇasyāsadṛśaṃ kāryam ity upapadyate // MMK_4.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:109: sarveṣām eva bhāvānāṃ rūpeṇaiva samaḥ kramaḥ // MMK_4.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:110: vigrahe yaḥ parīhāraṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
T04nagmmk_u:111: sarvaṃ tasyāparihṛtaṃ samaṃ sādhyena jāyate // MMK_4.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:112: vyākhyāne ya upālambhaṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
T04nagmmk_u:115: alakṣaṇaṃ prasajyeta syāt pūrvaṃ yadi lakṣaṇāt // MMK_5.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:116: alakṣaṇo na kaścic ca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kva cit /
T04nagmmk_u:117: asaty alakṣaṇe bhāve kramatāṃ kuha lakṣaṇam // MMK_5.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:122: tasmān na vidyate lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:125: bhāvābhāvavidharmā ca bhāvābhāvāv avaiti kaḥ // MMK_5.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:126: tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo na lakṣyaṃ nāpi lakṣaṇam /
T04nagmmk_u:127: ākāśam ākāśasamā dhātavaḥ pañca ye 'pare // MMK_5.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:128: astitvaṃ ye tu paśyanti nāstitvaṃ cālpabuddhayaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:130: rāgād yadi bhavet pūrvaṃ rakto rāgatiraskṛtaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:131: taṃ pratītya bhaved rāgo rakte rāgo bhavet sati // MMK_6.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:132: rakte 'sati punā rāgaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
T04nagmmk_u:133: sati vāsati vā rāge rakte 'py eṣa samaḥ kramaḥ // MMK_6.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:134: sahaiva punar udbhūtir na yuktā rāgaraktayoḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:135: bhavetāṃ rāgaraktau hi nirapekṣau parasparam // MMK_6.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:136: naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti na tenaiva hi tat saha /
T04nagmmk_u:137: pṛthaktve sahabhāvo 'tha kuta eva bhaviṣyati // MMK_6.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:138: ekatve sahabhāvaś cet syāt sahāyaṃ vināpi saḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:139: pṛthaktve sahabhāvaś cet syāt sahāyaṃ vināpi saḥ // MMK_6.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:140: pṛthaktve sahabhāvaś ca yadi kiṃ rāgaraktayoḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:141: siddhaḥ pṛthakpṛthagbhāvaḥ sahabhāvo yatas tayoḥ // MMK_6.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:143: sahabhāvaṃ kimartham tu parikalpayase tayoḥ // MMK_6.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:144: pṛthag na sidhyatīty evaṃ sahabhāvaṃ vikāṅkṣasi /
T04nagmmk_u:148: evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhir na saha nāsaha /
T04nagmmk_u:150: yadi saṃskṛta utpādas tatra yuktā trilakṣaṇī /
T04nagmmk_u:153: saṃskṛtasya samastāḥ syur ekatra katham ekadā // MMK_7.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:155: asti ced anavasthaivaṃ nāsti cet te na saṃskṛtāḥ // MMK_7.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:157: utpādotpādam utpādo maulo janayate punaḥ // MMK_7.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:159: maulenājanitas taṃ te sa kathaṃ janayiṣyati // MMK_7.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:160: sa te maulena janito maulaṃ janayate yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:161: maulaḥ sa tenājanitas tam utpādayate katham // MMK_7.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:162: ayam utpādyamānas te kāmam utpādayed imam /
T04nagmmk_u:163: yadīmam utpādayitum ajātaḥ śaknuyād ayam // MMK_7.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:165: utpādaḥ svaparātmānāv ubhāv utpādayet tathā // MMK_7.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:167: kiṃ prakāśayate dīpaḥ prakāśo hi tamovadhaḥ // MMK_7.9 //
T04nagmmk_u:169: notpadyamāno hi tamaḥ pradīpaḥ prāpnute yadā // MMK_7.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:170: aprāpyaiva pradīpena yadi vā nihataṃ tamaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:171: ihasthaḥ sarvalokasthaṃ sa tamo nihaniṣyati // MMK_7.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:175: athotpanno janayate jāte kiṃ janyate punaḥ // MMK_7.13 //
T04nagmmk_u:178: utpadyamānam utpattāv idaṃ na kramate yadā /
T04nagmmk_u:179: katham utpadyamānaṃ tu pratītyotpattim ucyate // MMK_7.15 //
T04nagmmk_u:180: pratītya yad yad bhavati tat tac chāntaṃ svabhāvataḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:181: tasmād utpadyamānaṃ ca śāntam utpattir eva ca // MMK_7.16 //
T04nagmmk_u:182: yadi kaścid anutpanno bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kva cit /
T04nagmmk_u:183: utpadyeta sa kiṃ tasmin bhāva utpadyate 'sati // MMK_7.17 //
T04nagmmk_u:185: utpādayet tam utpādam utpādaḥ katamaḥ punaḥ // MMK_7.18 //
T04nagmmk_u:187: athānutpāda utpannaḥ sarvam utpadyatāṃ tathā // MMK_7.19 //
T04nagmmk_u:188: sataś ca tāvad utpattir asataś ca na yujyate /
T04nagmmk_u:189: na sataś cāsataś ceti pūrvam evopapāditam // MMK_7.20 //
T04nagmmk_u:191: yaś cānirudhyamānas tu sa bhāvo nopapadyate // MMK_7.21 //
T04nagmmk_u:192: nāsthitas tiṣṭhate bhāvaḥ sthito bhāvo na tiṣṭhati /
T04nagmmk_u:193: na tiṣṭhate tiṣṭhamānaḥ ko 'nutpannaś ca tiṣṭhati // MMK_7.22 //
T04nagmmk_u:195: yaś cānirudhyamānas tu sa bhāvo nopapadyate // MMK_7.23 //
T04nagmmk_u:197: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā // MMK_7.24 //
T04nagmmk_u:198: sthityānyayā sthiteḥ sthānaṃ tayaiva ca na yujyate /
T04nagmmk_u:199: utpādasya yathotpādo nātmanā na parātmanā // MMK_7.25 //
T04nagmmk_u:201: tathā nirudhyamānaṃ ca kim ajātaṃ nirudhyate // MMK_7.26 //
T04nagmmk_u:208: sataś ca tāvad bhāvasya nirodho nopapadyate /
T04nagmmk_u:209: ekatve na hi bhāvaś ca nābhāvaś copapadyate // MMK_7.30 //
T04nagmmk_u:211: na dvitīyasya śirasaś chedanaṃ vidyate yathā // MMK_7.31 //
T04nagmmk_u:212: na svātmanā nirodho 'sti nirodho na parātmanā /
T04nagmmk_u:213: utpādasya yathotpādo nātmanā na parātmanā // MMK_7.32 //
T04nagmmk_u:215: saṃskṛtasyāprasiddhau ca kathaṃ setsyaty asaṃskṛtam // MMK_7.33 //
T04nagmmk_u:216: yathā māyā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
T04nagmmk_u:218: sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma sadbhūtaṃ na karotyayam /
T04nagmmk_u:219: kārako nāpy asadbhūtaḥ karmāsadbhūtam īhate // MMK_8.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:220: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syād akartṛkam /
T04nagmmk_u:221: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syād akarmakaḥ // MMK_8.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:223: ahetukaṃ bhavet karma kartā cāhetuko bhavet // MMK_8.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:224: hetāv asati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:225: tadabhāve kriyā kartā kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate // MMK_8.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:227: dharme cāsaty adharme ca phalaṃ tajjaṃ na vidyate // MMK_8.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:229: mārgaḥ sarvakriyāṇāṃ ca nairarthakyaṃ prasajyate // MMK_8.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:230: kārakaḥ sadasadbhūtaḥ sadasat kurute na tat /
T04nagmmk_u:231: parasparaviruddhaṃ hi sac cāsac caikataḥ kutaḥ // MMK_8.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:232: satā ca kriyate nāsan nāsatā kriyate ca sat /
T04nagmmk_u:233: kartrā sarve prasajyante doṣās tatra ta eva hi // MMK_8.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:234: nāsadbhūtaṃ na sadbhūtaḥ sadasadbhūtam eva vā /
T04nagmmk_u:235: karoti kārakaḥ karma pūrvoktair eva hetubhiḥ // MMK_8.9 //
T04nagmmk_u:237: karoti kārakaḥ karma pūrvoktair eva hetubhiḥ // MMK_8.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:238: karoti sadasadbhūto na san nāsac ca kārakaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:239: karma tat tu vijānīyāt pūrvoktair eva hetubhiḥ // MMK_8.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:240: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
T04nagmmk_u:241: karma pravartate nānyat paśyāmaḥ siddhikāraṇam // MMK_8.12 //
T04nagmmk_u:242: evaṃ vidyād upādānaṃ vyutsargād iti karmaṇaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:243: kartuś ca karmakartṛbhyāṃ śeṣān bhāvān vibhāvayet // MMK_8.13 // ***********************************************************
T04nagmmk_u:245: bhavanti yasya prāg ebhyaḥ so 'stīty eke vadantyuta // MMK_9.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:247: bhāvasya tasmāt prāg ebhyaḥ so 'sti bhāvo vyavasthitaḥ // MMK_9.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:249: yaḥ prāg vyavasthito bhāvaḥ kena prajñapyate 'tha saḥ // MMK_9.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:251: amūny api bhaviṣyanti vinā tena na saṃśayaḥ // MMK_9.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:252: ajyate kenacit kaścit kiṃcit kena cid ajyate /
T04nagmmk_u:253: kutaḥ kiṃcid vinā kaścit kiṃcit kiṃcid vinā kutaḥ // MMK_9.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:254: sarvebhyo darśanādibhyaḥ kaścit pūrvo na vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:255: ajyate darśanādinām anyena punar anyadā // MMK_9.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:256: sarvebhyo darśanādibhyo yadi pūrvo na vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:257: ekaikasmāt kathaṃ pūrvo darśanādeḥ sa vidyate // MMK_9.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:258: draṣṭā sa eva sa śrotā sa eva yadi vedakaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:259: ekaikasmād bhavet pūrvam evaṃ caitan na yujyate // MMK_9.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:260: draṣṭānya eva śrotānyo vedako 'nyaḥ punar yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:261: sati syād draṣṭari śrotā bahutvaṃ cātmanāṃ bhavet // MMK_9.9 //
T04nagmmk_u:263: bhavanti yebhyas teṣv eṣa bhūteṣv api na vidyate // MMK_9.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:265: na vidyate ced yasya sa na vidyanta imāny api // MMK_9.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:266: prāk ca yo darśanādibhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ cordhvam eva ca /
T04nagmmk_u:268: yad indhanaṃ sa ced agnir ekatvaṃ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:269: anyaś ced indhanād agnir indhanād apy ṛte bhavet // MMK_10.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:274: tatraitat syād idhyamānam indhanaṃ bhavatīti cet /
T04nagmmk_u:275: kenedhyatām indhanaṃ tat tāvanmātram idaṃ yadā // MMK_10.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:276: anyo na prāpsyate 'prapto na dhakṣyaty adahan punaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:277: na nirvāsyaty anirvāṇaḥ sthāsyate vā svaliṅgavān // MMK_10.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:278: anya evandhanād agnir indhanaṃ prāpnuyād yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:279: strī saṃprāpnoti puruṣaṃ puruṣaś ca striyaṃ yathā // MMK_10.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:280: anya evendhanād agnir indhanaṃ kāmam āpnuyāt /
T04nagmmk_u:281: agnīndhane yadi syātām anyonyena tiraskṛte // MMK_10.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:283: katarat pūrvaniṣpannaṃ yad apekṣyāgnir indhanam // MMK_10.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:285: evaṃ satīndhanaṃ cāpi bhaviṣyati niragnikam // MMK_10.9 //
T04nagmmk_u:286: yo 'pekṣya sidhyate bhāvas tam evāpekṣya sidhyati /
T04nagmmk_u:287: yadi yo 'pekṣitavyaḥ sa sidhyatāṃ kam apekṣya kaḥ // MMK_10.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:289: athāpy apekṣate siddhas tv apekṣāsya na yujyate // MMK_10.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:291: apekṣyendhanam agniṃ na nānapekṣyāgnim indhanam // MMK_10.12 //
T04nagmmk_u:292: āgacchaty anyato nāgnir indhane 'gnir na vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:294: indhanaṃ punar agnir na nāgnir anyatra cendhanāt /
T04nagmmk_u:295: nāgnir indhanavān nāgnāv indhanāni na teṣu saḥ // MMK_10.14 //
T04nagmmk_u:298: ātmanaś ca satattvaṃ ye bhāvānāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak /
T04nagmmk_u:300: pūrvā prajñāyate koṭir nety uvāca mahāmuniḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:301: saṃsāro 'navarāgro hi nāsyādir nāpi paścimam // MMK_11.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:302: naivāgraṃ nāvaraṃ yasya tasya madhyaṃ kuto bhavet /
T04nagmmk_u:304: pūrvaṃ jātir yadi bhavej jarāmaraṇam uttaram /
T04nagmmk_u:305: nirjarā maraṇā jātir bhavej jāyeta cāmṛtaḥ // MMK_11.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:306: paścāj jātir yadi bhavej jarāmaraṇam āditaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:307: ahetukam ajātasya syāj jarāmaraṇaṃ katham // MMK_11.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:308: na jarāmaraṇaṃ caiva jātiś ca saha yujyate /
T04nagmmk_u:309: mriyeta jāyamānaś ca syāc cāhetukatobhayoḥ // MMK_11.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:311: prapañcayanti tāṃ jātiṃ taj jarāmaraṇaṃ ca kim // MMK_11.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:312: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇam eva ca /
T04nagmmk_u:313: vedanā vedakaś caiva santy arthā ye ca ke cana // MMK_11.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:314: pūrvā na vidyate koṭiḥ saṃsārasya na kevalam /
T04nagmmk_u:316: svayaṃ kṛtaṃ parakṛtaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṛtam ahetukam /
T04nagmmk_u:317: duḥkham ity eka icchanti tac ca kāryaṃ na yujyate // MMK_12.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:318: svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavet pratītya na tato bhavet /
T04nagmmk_u:319: skandhān imān amī skandhāḥ saṃbhavanti pratītya hi // MMK_12.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:320: yady amībhya ime 'nye syur ebhyo vāmī pare yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:321: bhavet parakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ parair ebhir amī kṛtāḥ // MMK_12.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:322: svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadi duḥkhaṃ punar vinā /
T04nagmmk_u:323: svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam // MMK_12.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:325: pareṇa kṛtvā tad duḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ // MMK_12.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:327: vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat // MMK_12.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:329: paro hi duḥkhaṃ yat kuryāt tat tasya syāt svayaṃ kṛtam // MMK_12.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:330: na tāvat svakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tat kṛtam /
T04nagmmk_u:331: paro nātmakṛtaś cet syād duḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ katham // MMK_12.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:332: syād ubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ syād ekaikakṛtaṃ yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:334: na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:336: tan mṛṣā moṣadharma yad bhagavān ity abhāṣata /
T04nagmmk_u:337: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārās tena te mṛṣā // MMK_13.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:338: tan mṛṣā moṣadharma yad yadi kiṃ tatra muṣyate /
T04nagmmk_u:341: nāsvabhāvaś ca bhāvo 'sti bhāvānāṃ śūnyatā yataḥ // MMK_13.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:342: kasya syād anyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvaś cen na vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:343: kasya syād anyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvo yadi vidyate // MMK_13.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:345: yuvā na jīryate yasmād yasmāj jīrṇo na jīryate // MMK_13.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:346: tasya ced anyathābhāvaḥ kṣīram eva bhaved dadhi /
T04nagmmk_u:347: kṣīrād anyasya kasyacid dadhibhāvo bhaviṣyati // MMK_13.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:348: yady aśūnyaṃ bhavet kiṃcit syāc chūnyam iti kiṃ cana /
T04nagmmk_u:349: na kiṃcid asty aśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati // MMK_13.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:351: yeṣāṃ tu śūnyatādṛṣṭis tān asādhyān babhāṣire // MMK_13.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:352: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā trīṇy etāni dviśo dviśaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:353: sarvaśaś ca na saṃsargam anyonyena vrajanty uta // MMK_14.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:354: evaṃ rāgaś ca raktaś ca rañjanīyaṃ ca dṛśyatām /
T04nagmmk_u:355: traidhena śeṣāḥ kleśāś ca śeṣāṇy āyatanāni ca // MMK_14.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:356: anyenānyasya saṃsargas tac cānyatvaṃ na vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:357: draṣṭavyaprabhṛtīnāṃ yan na saṃsargaṃ vrajanty ataḥ // MMK_14.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:358: na ca kevalam anyatvaṃ draṣṭavyāder na vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:359: kasyacit kenacit sārdhaṃ nānyatvam upapadyate // MMK_14.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:360: anyad anyat pratītyānyan nānyad anyad ṛte 'nyataḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:361: yat pratītya ca yat tasmāt tad anyan nopapadyate // MMK_14.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:362: yady anyad anyad anyasmād anyasmād apy ṛte bhavet /
T04nagmmk_u:363: tad anyad anyad anyasmād ṛte nāsti ca nāsty ataḥ // MMK_14.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:365: avidyamāne cānyatve nāsty anyad vā tad eva vā // MMK_14.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:366: na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate /
T04nagmmk_u:370: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
T04nagmmk_u:371: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca // MMK_15.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:373: svabhāvaḥ parabhāvasya parabhāvo hi kathyate // MMK_15.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:375: svabhāve parabhāve ca sati bhāvo hi sidhyati // MMK_15.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:376: bhāvasya ced aprasiddhir abhāvo naiva sidhyati /
T04nagmmk_u:377: bhāvasya hy anyathābhāvam abhāvaṃ bruvate janāḥ // MMK_15.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:378: svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvam eva ca /
T04nagmmk_u:379: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane // MMK_15.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:382: yady astitvaṃ prakṛtyā syān na bhaved asya nāstitā /
T04nagmmk_u:383: prakṛter anyathābhāvo na hi jātūpapadyate // MMK_15.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:385: prakṛtau kasya vā satyām anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati // MMK_15.9 //
T04nagmmk_u:388: asti yad dhi svabhāvena na tan nāstīti śāśvatam /
T04nagmmk_u:390: saṃskārāḥ saṃsaranti cen na nityāḥ saṃsaranti te /
T04nagmmk_u:391: saṃsaranti ca nānityāḥ sattve 'py eṣa samaḥ kramaḥ // MMK_16.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:393: pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo 'sau nāsti kaḥ saṃsariṣyati // MMK_16.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:395: vibhavaś cānupādānaḥ kaḥ sa kiṃ saṃsariṣyati // MMK_16.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:396: saṃskārāṇāṃ na nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ cid upapadyate /
T04nagmmk_u:397: sattvasyāpi na nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ cid upapadyate // MMK_16.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:399: saṃskārāḥ pūrvavat sattvo badhyate na na mucyate // MMK_16.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:400: bandhanaṃ ced upādānaṃ sopādāno na badhyate /
T04nagmmk_u:402: badhnīyād bandhanaṃ kāmaṃ bandhyāt pūrvaṃ bhaved yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:403: na cāsti tac cheṣam uktaṃ gamyamānagatāgataiḥ // MMK_16.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:404: baddho na mucyate tāvad abaddho naiva mucyate /
T04nagmmk_u:405: syātāṃ baddhe mucyamāne yugapad bandhamokṣaṇe // MMK_16.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:407: iti yeṣāṃ grahas teṣām upādānamahāgrahaḥ // MMK_16.9 //
T04nagmmk_u:409: yatra kas tatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate // MMK_16.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:411: maitraṃ sa dharamas tad bījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca // MMK_17.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:414: tatra yac cetanety uktaṃ karma tan mānasaṃ smṛtam /
T04nagmmk_u:415: cetayitvā ca yat tūktaṃ tat tu kāyikavācikam // MMK_17.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:417: avijñaptaya evānyāḥ smṛtā viratayas tathā // MMK_17.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:419: cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ // MMK_17.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:420: tiṣṭhaty ā pākakālāc cet karma tan nityatām iyāt /
T04nagmmk_u:421: niruddhaṃ cen niruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati // MMK_17.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:423: tataḥ phalam ṛte bījāt sa ca nābhipravartate // MMK_17.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:424: bījāc ca yasmāt saṃtānaḥ saṃtānāc ca phalodbhavaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:425: bījapūrvaṃ phalaṃ tasmān nocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam // MMK_17.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:427: tataḥ phalam ṛte cittāt sa ca nābhipravartate // MMK_17.9 //
T04nagmmk_u:428: cittāc ca yasmāt saṃtānaḥ saṃtānāc ca phalodbhavaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:429: karmapūrvaṃ phalaṃ tasmān nocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam // MMK_17.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:431: phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca // MMK_17.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:432: bahavaś ca mahāntaś ca doṣāḥ syur yadi kalpanā /
T04nagmmk_u:433: syād eṣā tena naivaiṣā kalpanātropapadyate // MMK_17.12 //
T04nagmmk_u:434: imāṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi kalpanāṃ yātra yojyate /
T04nagmmk_u:435: buddhaiḥ pratyekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś cānuvarṇitām // MMK_17.13 //
T04nagmmk_u:437: caturvidho dhātutaḥ sa prakṛtyāvyākṛtaś ca saḥ // MMK_17.14 //
T04nagmmk_u:438: prahāṇato na praheyo bhāvanāheya eva vā /
T04nagmmk_u:439: tasmād avipraṇāśena jāyate karmaṇāṃ phalam // MMK_17.15 //
T04nagmmk_u:440: prahāṇataḥ praheyaḥ syāt karmaṇaḥ saṃkrameṇa vā /
T04nagmmk_u:441: yadi doṣāḥ prasajyeraṃs tatra karmavadhādayaḥ // MMK_17.16 //
T04nagmmk_u:443: pratisaṃdhau sadhātūnām eka utpadyate tu saḥ // MMK_17.17 //
T04nagmmk_u:444: karmaṇaḥ karmaṇo dṛṣṭe dharma utpadyate tu saḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:445: dviprakārasya sarvasya vipakve 'pi ca tiṣṭhati // MMK_17.18 //
T04nagmmk_u:446: phalavyatikramād vā sa maraṇād vā nirudhyate /
T04nagmmk_u:447: anāsravaṃ sāsravaṃ ca vibhāgaṃ tatra lakṣayet // MMK_17.19 //
T04nagmmk_u:448: śūnyatā ca na cocchedaḥ saṃsāraś ca na śāśvatam /
T04nagmmk_u:449: karmaṇo 'vipraṇāśaś ca dharmo buddhena deśitaḥ // MMK_17.20 //
T04nagmmk_u:450: karma notpadyate kasmān niḥsvabhāvaṃ yatas tataḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:451: yasmāc ca tad anutpannaṃ na tasmād vipraṇaśyati // MMK_17.21 //
T04nagmmk_u:452: karma svabhāvataś cet syāc chāśvataṃ syād asaṃśayam /
T04nagmmk_u:453: akṛtaṃ ca bhavet karma kriyate na hi śāśvatam // MMK_17.22 //
T04nagmmk_u:456: vyavahārā virudhyante sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:457: puṇyapāpakṛtor naiva pravibhāgaś ca yujyate // MMK_17.24 //
T04nagmmk_u:458: tad vipakvavipākaṃ ca punar eva vipakṣyati /
T04nagmmk_u:459: karma vyavasthitaṃ yasmāt tasmāt svābhāvikaṃ yadi // MMK_17.25 //
T04nagmmk_u:460: karma kleśātmakaṃ cedaṃ te ca kleśā na tattvataḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:461: na cet te tattvataḥ kleśāḥ karma syāt tattvataḥ katham // MMK_17.26 //
T04nagmmk_u:462: karma kleśāś ca dehānāṃ pratyayāḥ samudāhṛtāḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:463: karma kleśāś ca te śūnyā yadi deheṣu kā kathā // MMK_17.27 //
T04nagmmk_u:465: sa bhoktā sa ca na kartur anyo na ca sa eva saḥ // MMK_17.28 //
T04nagmmk_u:467: asti yasmād idaṃ karma tasmāt kartāpi nāsty ataḥ // MMK_17.29 //
T04nagmmk_u:468: karma cen nāsti kartā ca kutaḥ syāt karmajaṃ phalam /
T04nagmmk_u:469: asaty atha phale bhoktā kuta eva bhaviṣyati // MMK_17.30 //
T04nagmmk_u:471: nirmito nirmimītānyaṃ sa ca nirmitakaḥ punaḥ // MMK_17.31 //
T04nagmmk_u:472: tathā nirmitakākāraḥ kartā yat karma tat kṛtam /
T04nagmmk_u:473: tadyathā nirmitenānyo nirmito nirmitas tathā // MMK_17.32 //
T04nagmmk_u:474: kleśāḥ karmāṇi dehāś ca kartāraś ca phalāni ca /
T04nagmmk_u:476: ātmā skandhā yadi bhaved udayavyayabhāg bhavet /
T04nagmmk_u:477: skandhebhyo 'nyo yadi bhaved bhaved askandhalakṣaṇaḥ // MMK_18.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:478: ātmany asati cātmīyaṃ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
T04nagmmk_u:480: nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaś ca so 'pi na vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:481: nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ yaḥ paśyati na paśyati // MMK_18.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:482: mamety aham iti kṣīṇe bahirdhādhyātmam eva ca /
T04nagmmk_u:483: nirudhyata upādānaṃ tatkṣayāj janmanaḥ kṣayaḥ // MMK_18.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:485: te prapañcāt prapañcas tu śūnyatāyāṃ nirudhyate // MMK_18.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:486: ātmety api prajñapitam anātmety api deśitam /
T04nagmmk_u:487: buddhair nātmā na cānātmā kaścid ity api deśitam // MMK_18.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:489: anutpannāniruddhā hi nirvāṇam iva dharmatā // MMK_18.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:490: sarvaṃ tathyaṃ na vā tathyaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyam eva ca /
T04nagmmk_u:491: naivātathyaṃ naiva tathyam etad buddhānuśāsanam // MMK_18.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:493: nirvikalpam anānārtham etat tattvasya lakṣaṇam // MMK_18.9 //
T04nagmmk_u:494: pratītya yad yad bhavati na hi tāvat tad eva tat /
T04nagmmk_u:495: na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam // MMK_18.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:497: etat tal lokanāthānāṃ buddhānāṃ śāsanāmṛtam // MMK_18.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:500: pratyutpanno 'nāgataś ca yady atītam apekṣya hi /
T04nagmmk_u:502: pratyutpanno 'nāgataś ca na stas tatra punar yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:503: pratyutpanno 'nāgataś ca syātāṃ katham apekṣya tam // MMK_19.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:504: anapekṣya punaḥ siddhir nātītaṃ vidyate tayoḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:505: pratyutpanno 'nāgataś ca tasmāt kālo na vidyate // MMK_19.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:508: nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:509: yo gṛhyetāgṛhītaś ca kālaḥ prajñapyate katham // MMK_19.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:510: bhāvaṃ pratītya kālaś cet kālo bhāvād ṛte kutaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:512: hetoś ca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:513: phalamasti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham // MMK_20.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:514: hetoś ca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:515: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham // MMK_20.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:516: hetoś ca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryām asti cet phalam /
T04nagmmk_u:517: gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāṃ sāmagryāṃ ca na gṛhyate // MMK_20.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:518: hetoś ca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti cet phalam /
T04nagmmk_u:519: hetavaḥ pratyayāś ca syur ahetupratyayaiḥ samāḥ // MMK_20.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:520: hetuṃ phalasya dattvā ca yadi hetur nirudhyate /
T04nagmmk_u:521: yad dattaṃ yan nirudhaṃ ca hetor ātmadvayaṃ bhavet // MMK_20.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:522: hetuṃ phalasyādattvā ca yadi hetur nirudhyate /
T04nagmmk_u:523: hetau niruddhe jātaṃ tat phalam āhetukaṃ bhavet // MMK_20.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:524: phalaṃ sahaiva sāmagryā yadi prādurbhavet punaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:525: ekakālau prasajyete janako yaś ca janyate // MMK_20.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:526: pūrvam eva ca sāmagryāḥ phalaṃ prādurbhaved yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:528: niruddhe cet phalaṃ hetau hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet /
T04nagmmk_u:529: pūrvajātasya hetoś ca punarjanma prasajyate // MMK_20.9 //
T04nagmmk_u:531: hetus tiṣṭhann api kathaṃ phalena janayed vṛtaḥ // MMK_20.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:533: na hy adṛṣṭvā na dṛṣṭvāpi hetur janayate phalam // MMK_20.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:534: nātītasya hy atītena phalasya saha hetunā /
T04nagmmk_u:535: nājātena na jātena saṃgatir jātu vidyate // MMK_20.12 //
T04nagmmk_u:536: na jātasya hy ajātena phalasya saha hetunā /
T04nagmmk_u:537: nātītena na jātena saṃgatir jātu vidyate // MMK_20.13 //
T04nagmmk_u:538: nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā /
T04nagmmk_u:539: nājātena na naṣṭena saṃgatir jātu vidyate // MMK_20.14 //
T04nagmmk_u:540: asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam /
T04nagmmk_u:541: satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam // MMK_20.15 //
T04nagmmk_u:542: hetuḥ phalena śūnyaś cet kathaṃ janayate phalam /
T04nagmmk_u:543: hetuḥ phalenāśūnyaś cet kathaṃ janayate phalam // MMK_20.16 //
T04nagmmk_u:545: aniruddham anutpannam aśūnyaṃ tad bhaviṣyati // MMK_20.17 //
T04nagmmk_u:546: katham utpatsyate śūnyaṃ kathaṃ śūnyaṃ nirotsyate /
T04nagmmk_u:547: śūnyam apy aniruddhaṃ tad anutpannaṃ prasajyate // MMK_20.18 //
T04nagmmk_u:548: hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate /
T04nagmmk_u:549: hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate // MMK_20.19 //
T04nagmmk_u:551: pṛthaktve phalahetvoḥ syāt tulyo hetur ahetunā // MMK_20.20 //
T04nagmmk_u:553: phalaṃ svabhāvāsadbhūtaṃ kiṃ hetur janayiṣyati // MMK_20.21 //
T04nagmmk_u:555: hetutvānupapattau ca phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati // MMK_20.22 //
T04nagmmk_u:556: na ca pratyayahetūnām iyam ātmānam ātmanā /
T04nagmmk_u:557: yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayet phalam // MMK_20.23 //
T04nagmmk_u:560: vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai /
T04nagmmk_u:561: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai // MMK_21.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:562: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā /
T04nagmmk_u:563: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā // MMK_21.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:565: na janma maraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate // MMK_21.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:566: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā /
T04nagmmk_u:567: anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācin na vidyate // MMK_21.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:569: na janma maraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate // MMK_21.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:570: sahānyonyena vā siddhir vinānyonyena vā yayoḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:571: na vidyate tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // MMK_21.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:573: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca // MMK_21.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:574: saṃbhavo vibhavaś caiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:575: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate // MMK_21.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:578: saṃbhavo vibhavaś caiva naika ity upapadyate /
T04nagmmk_u:579: saṃbhavo vibhavaś caiva na nānety upapadyate // MMK_21.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:580: dṛśyate saṃbhavaścaiva vibhavaś caiva te bhavet /
T04nagmmk_u:581: dṛśyate saṃbhavaścaiva mohād vibhava eva ca // MMK_21.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:582: na bhāvāj jāyate bhāvo bhāvo 'bhāvān na jāyate /
T04nagmmk_u:583: nābhāvāj jāyate 'bhāvo 'bhāvo bhāvān na jāyate // MMK_21.12 //
T04nagmmk_u:584: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
T04nagmmk_u:585: na svataḥ parataś caiva jāyate jāyate kutaḥ // MMK_21.13 //
T04nagmmk_u:587: prasajyate sa bhāvo hi nityo 'nityo 'tha vā bhavet // MMK_21.14 //
T04nagmmk_u:589: udayavyayasaṃtānaḥ phalahetvor bhavaḥ sa hi // MMK_21.15 //
T04nagmmk_u:594: carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:595: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ // MMK_21.18 //
T04nagmmk_u:597: nirudhyamāna ekaḥ syāj jāyamāno 'paro bhavet // MMK_21.19 //
T04nagmmk_u:598: na cen nirudhyamānaś ca jāyamānaś ca yujyate /
T04nagmmk_u:599: sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate // MMK_21.20 //
T04nagmmk_u:600: evaṃ triṣv api kāleṣu na yuktā bhavasaṃtatiḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:602: skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:603: tathāgataḥ skandhavān na katamo 'tra tathāgataḥ // MMK_22.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:604: buddhaḥ skandhān upādāya yadi nāsti svabhāvataḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:605: svabhāvataś ca yo nāsti kutaḥ sa parabhāvataḥ // MMK_22.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:607: yaś cānātmā sa ca kathaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ // MMK_22.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:608: yadi nāsti svabhāvaś ca parabhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
T04nagmmk_u:609: svabhāvaparabhāvābhyām ṛte kaḥ sa tathāgataḥ // MMK_22.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:610: skandhān yady anupādāya bhavet kaścit tathāgataḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:611: sa idānīm upādadyād upādāya tato bhavet // MMK_22.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:612: skandhāṃś cāpy anupādāya nāsti kaścit tathāgataḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:613: yaś ca nāsty anupādāya sa upādāsyate katham // MMK_22.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:614: na bhavaty anupādattam upādānaṃ ca kiṃ cana /
T04nagmmk_u:615: na cāsti nirupādānaḥ kathaṃ cana tathāgataḥ // MMK_22.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:616: tattvānyatvena yo nāsti mṛgyamāṇaś ca pañcadhā /
T04nagmmk_u:617: upādānena sa kathaṃ prajñapyate tathāgataḥ // MMK_22.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:618: yad apīdam upādānaṃ tat svabhāvān na vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:619: svabhāvataś ca yan nāsti kutas tat parabhāvataḥ // MMK_22.9 //
T04nagmmk_u:620: evaṃ śūnyam upādānam upādātā ca sarvaśaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:621: prajñapyate ca śūnyena kathaṃ śūnyas tathāgataḥ // MMK_22.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:622: śūnyam iti na vaktavyam aśūnyam iti vā bhavet /
T04nagmmk_u:623: ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate // MMK_22.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:625: antānantādi cāpy atra kutaḥ śānte catuṣṭayam // MMK_22.12 //
T04nagmmk_u:627: nāstīti sa vikalpayan nirvṛtasyāpi kalpayet // MMK_22.13 //
T04nagmmk_u:629: paraṃ nirodhād bhavati buddho na bhavatīti vā // MMK_22.14 //
T04nagmmk_u:631: te prapañcahatāḥ sarve na paśyanti tathāgatam // MMK_22.15 //
T04nagmmk_u:634: saṃkalpaprabhavo rāgo dveṣo mohaś ca kathyate /
T04nagmmk_u:637: te svabhāvān na vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ // MMK_23.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:638: ātmano 'stitvanāstitve na kathaṃ cic ca sidhyataḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:639: taṃ vināstitvanāstitve kleśānāṃ sidhyataḥ katham // MMK_23.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:640: kasya cid dhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati /
T04nagmmk_u:641: kaścid āho vinā kaṃcit santi kleśā na kasyacit // MMK_23.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:642: svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā /
T04nagmmk_u:643: svakāyadṛṣṭivat kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣv api na pañcadhā // MMK_23.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:647: vastu rāgasya doṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate // MMK_23.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:650: aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutas teṣu bhaviṣyati /
T04nagmmk_u:653: yat pratītya śubhaṃ tasmāc chubhaṃ naivopapadyate // MMK_23.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:655: yat pratītyāśubhaṃ tasmād aśubhaṃ naiva vidyate // MMK_23.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:656: avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati /
T04nagmmk_u:657: aśubhe 'vidyamāne ca kuto dveṣo bhaviṣyati // MMK_23.12 //
T04nagmmk_u:658: anitye nityam ity evaṃ yadi grāho viparyayaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:659: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ // MMK_23.13 //
T04nagmmk_u:660: anitye nityam ity evaṃ yadi grāho viparyayaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:661: anityam ity api grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ // MMK_23.14 //
T04nagmmk_u:662: yena gṛhṇāti yo grāho grahītā yac ca gṛhyate /
T04nagmmk_u:663: upaśāntāni sarvāṇi tasmād grāho na vidyate // MMK_23.15 //
T04nagmmk_u:664: avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyag eva vā /
T04nagmmk_u:665: bhaved viparyayaḥ kasya bhavet kasyāviparyayaḥ // MMK_23.16 //
T04nagmmk_u:667: na cāpy aviparītasya saṃbhavanti viparyayāḥ // MMK_23.17 //
T04nagmmk_u:669: vimṛśasva svayaṃ kasya saṃbhavanti viparyayāḥ // MMK_23.18 //
T04nagmmk_u:672: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
T04nagmmk_u:673: na svataḥ parataś ceti viparyayagataḥ kutaḥ // MMK_23.20 //
T04nagmmk_u:674: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:675: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ // MMK_23.21 //
T04nagmmk_u:676: nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:677: anātmā 'śucy anityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate // MMK_23.22 //
T04nagmmk_u:680: yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ kecid dhi kasyacit /
T04nagmmk_u:681: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati // MMK_23.24 //
T04nagmmk_u:682: yady abhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ kecid dhi kasyacit /
T04nagmmk_u:684: yadi śūnyam idaṃ sarvam udayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:685: caturṇām āryasatyānām abhāvas te prasajyate // MMK_24.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:686: parijñā ca prahāṇaṃ ca bhāvanā sākṣikarma ca /
T04nagmmk_u:688: tadabhāvān na vidyante catvāry āryaphalāni ca /
T04nagmmk_u:689: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ // MMK_24.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:690: saṃgho nāsti na cet santi te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:691: abhāvāc cāryasatyānāṃ saddharmo 'pi na vidyate // MMK_24.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:692: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati /
T04nagmmk_u:693: evaṃ trīṇy api ratnāni bruvāṇaḥ pratibādhase // MMK_24.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:694: śūnyatāṃ phalasadbhāvam adharmaṃ dharmam eva ca /
T04nagmmk_u:696: atra brūmaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ na tvaṃ vetsi prayojanam /
T04nagmmk_u:697: śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ ca tata evaṃ vihanyase // MMK_24.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:699: lokasaṃvṛtisatyaṃ ca satyaṃ ca paramārthataḥ // MMK_24.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:700: ye 'nayor na vijānanti vibhāgaṃ satyayor dvayoḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:701: te tattvaṃ na vijānanti gambhīraṃ buddhaśāsane // MMK_24.9 //
T04nagmmk_u:705: sarpo yathā durgṛhīto vidyā vā duṣprasādhitā // MMK_24.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:706: ataś ca pratyudāvṛttaṃ cittaṃ deśayituṃ muneḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:707: dharmaṃ matvāsya dharmasya mandair duravagāhatām // MMK_24.12 //
T04nagmmk_u:708: śūnyatāyām adhilayaṃ yaṃ punaḥ kurute bhavān /
T04nagmmk_u:709: doṣaprasaṅgo nāsmākaṃ sa śūnye nopapadyate // MMK_24.13 //
T04nagmmk_u:710: sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate /
T04nagmmk_u:711: sarvaṃ na yujyate tasya śūnyaṃ yasya na yujyate // MMK_24.14 //
T04nagmmk_u:712: sa tvaṃ doṣān ātmanīyān asmāsu paripātayan /
T04nagmmk_u:713: aśvam evābhirūḍhaḥ sann aśvam evāsi vismṛtaḥ // MMK_24.15 //
T04nagmmk_u:715: ahetupratyayān bhāvāṃs tvam evaṃ sati paśyasi // MMK_24.16 //
T04nagmmk_u:716: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartāraṃ karaṇaṃ kriyām /
T04nagmmk_u:717: utpādaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca phalaṃ ca pratibādhase // MMK_24.17 //
T04nagmmk_u:719: sā prajñaptir upādāya pratipat saiva madhyamā // MMK_24.18 //
T04nagmmk_u:720: apratītya samutpanno dharmaḥ kaścin na vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:721: yasmāt tasmād aśūnyo hi dharmaḥ kaścin na vidyate // MMK_24.19 //
T04nagmmk_u:722: yady aśūnyam idaṃ sarvam udayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:723: caturṇām āryasatyānām abhāvas te prasajyate // MMK_24.20 //
T04nagmmk_u:725: anityam uktaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi tat svābhāvye na vidyate // MMK_24.21 //
T04nagmmk_u:727: tasmāt samudayo nāsti śūnyatāṃ pratibādhataḥ // MMK_24.22 //
T04nagmmk_u:728: na nirodhaḥ svabhāvena sato duḥkhasya vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:731: athāsau bhāvyate mārgaḥ svābhāvyaṃ te na vidyate // MMK_24.24 //
T04nagmmk_u:732: yadā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodhaś ca na vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:735: parijñānaṃ nanu kila svabhāvaḥ samavasthitaḥ // MMK_24.26 //
T04nagmmk_u:737: parijñāvan na yujyante catvāry api phalāni ca // MMK_24.27 //
T04nagmmk_u:738: svabhāvenānadhigataṃ yat phalaṃ tat punaḥ katham /
T04nagmmk_u:739: śakyaṃ samadhigantuṃ syāt svabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇataḥ // MMK_24.28 //
T04nagmmk_u:740: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:741: saṃgho nāsti na cet santi te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ // MMK_24.29 //
T04nagmmk_u:743: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati // MMK_24.30 //
T04nagmmk_u:744: apratītyāpi bodhiṃ ca tava buddhaḥ prasajyate /
T04nagmmk_u:745: apratītyāpi buddhaṃ ca tava bodhiḥ prasajyate // MMK_24.31 //
T04nagmmk_u:746: yaś cābuddhaḥ svabhāvena sa bodhāya ghaṭann api /
T04nagmmk_u:748: na ca dharmam adharmaṃ vā kaścij jātu kariṣyati /
T04nagmmk_u:749: kim aṣūnyasya kartavyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kriyate na hi // MMK_24.33 //
T04nagmmk_u:750: vinā dharmam adharmaṃ ca phalaṃ hi tava vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:751: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate // MMK_24.34 //
T04nagmmk_u:752: dharmādharmanimittaṃ vā yadi te vidyate phalam /
T04nagmmk_u:753: dharmādharmasamutpannam aśūnyaṃ te kathaṃ phalam // MMK_24.35 //
T04nagmmk_u:756: na kartavyaṃ bhavet kiṃcid anārabdhā bhavet kriyā /
T04nagmmk_u:757: kārakaḥ syād akurvāṇaḥ śūnyatāṃ pratibādhataḥ // MMK_24.37 //
T04nagmmk_u:758: ajātam aniruddhaṃ ca kūṭaśthaṃ ca bhaviṣyati /
T04nagmmk_u:759: vicitrābhir avasthābhiḥ svabhāve rahitaṃ jagat // MMK_24.38 //
T04nagmmk_u:761: sarvakleśaprahāṇaṃ ca yady aśūnyaṃ na vidyate // MMK_24.39 //
T04nagmmk_u:764: yadi śūnyam idaṃ sarvam udayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:765: prahāṇād vā nirodhād vā kasya nirvāṇam iṣyate // MMK_25.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:766: yady aśūnyam idaṃ sarvam udayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:767: prahāṇād vā nirodhād vā kasya nirvāṇam iṣyate // MMK_25.2 //
T04nagmmk_u:769: aniruddham anutpannam etan nirvāṇam ucyate // MMK_25.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:771: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā // MMK_25.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:772: bhāvaś ca yadi nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet /
T04nagmmk_u:773: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kva cana kaś cana // MMK_25.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:774: bhāvaś ca yadi nirvāṇam anupādāya tat katham /
T04nagmmk_u:775: nirvāṇaṃ nānupādāya kaścid bhāvo hi vidyate // MMK_25.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:776: bhāvo yadi na nirvāṇam abhāvaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati /
T04nagmmk_u:777: nirvāṇaṃ yatra bhāvo na nābhāvas tatra vidyate // MMK_25.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:778: yady abhāvaś ca nirvāṇam anupādāya tat katham /
T04nagmmk_u:779: nirvāṇaṃ na hy abhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate // MMK_25.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:782: prahāṇaṃ cābravīc chāstā bhavasya vibhavasya ca /
T04nagmmk_u:783: tasmān na bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇam iti yujyate // MMK_25.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:784: bhaved abhāvo bhāvaś ca nirvāṇam ubhayaṃ yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:785: bhaved abhāvo bhāvaś ca mokṣas tac ca na yujyate // MMK_25.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:786: bhaved abhāvo bhāvaś ca nirvāṇam ubhayaṃ yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:787: nānupādāya nirvāṇam upādāyobhayaṃ hi tat // MMK_25.12 //
T04nagmmk_u:788: bhaved abhāvo bhāvaś ca nirvāṇam ubhayaṃ katham /
T04nagmmk_u:789: asaṃskṛtaṃ hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau // MMK_25.13 //
T04nagmmk_u:790: bhaved abhāvo bhāvaś ca nirvāṇa ubhayaṃ katham /
T04nagmmk_u:791: tayor abhāvo hy ekatra prakāśatamasor iva // MMK_25.14 //
T04nagmmk_u:792: naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇam iti yā 'ñjanā /
T04nagmmk_u:793: abhāve caiva bhāve ca sā siddhe sati sidhyati // MMK_25.15 //
T04nagmmk_u:794: naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yadi vidyate /
T04nagmmk_u:795: naivābhāvo naiva bhāva iti kena tad ajyate // MMK_25.16 //
T04nagmmk_u:796: paraṃ nirodhād bhagavān bhavatīty eva nājyate /
T04nagmmk_u:797: na bhavaty ubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nājyate // MMK_25.17 //
T04nagmmk_u:799: na bhavaty ubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nājyate // MMK_25.18 //
T04nagmmk_u:800: na saṃsārasya nirvāṇāt kiṃcid asti viśeṣaṇam /
T04nagmmk_u:801: na nirvāṇasya saṃsārāt kiṃcid asti viśeṣaṇam // MMK_25.19 //
T04nagmmk_u:802: nirvāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca /
T04nagmmk_u:803: na tayor antaraṃ kiṃcit susūkṣmam api vidyate // MMK_25.20 //
T04nagmmk_u:804: paraṃ nirodhād antādyāḥ śāśvatādyāś ca dṛṣṭayaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:805: nirvāṇam aparāntaṃ ca pūrvāntaṃ ca samāśritāḥ // MMK_25.21 //
T04nagmmk_u:806: śūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu kim anantaṃ kim antavat /
T04nagmmk_u:807: kim anantam antavac ca nānantaṃ nāntavac ca kim // MMK_25.22 //
T04nagmmk_u:808: kiṃ tad eva kim anyat kiṃ śāśvataṃ kim aśāśvatam /
T04nagmmk_u:809: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca kiṃ vā nobhayam apy atha // MMK_25.23 //
T04nagmmk_u:811: na kva cit kasyacit kaścid dharmo buddhena deśitaḥ // MMK_25.24 // ***********************************************************
T04nagmmk_u:813: abhisaṃskurute yāṃs tair gatiṃ gacchati karmabhiḥ // MMK_26.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:818: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca samanvāhāram eva ca /
T04nagmmk_u:821: sparśaḥ sa tasmāt sparśāc ca vedanā saṃpravartate // MMK_26.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:825: syād dhi yady anupādāno mucyeta na bhaved bhavaḥ // MMK_26.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:826: pañca skandhāḥ sa ca bhavo bhavāj jātiḥ pravartate /
T04nagmmk_u:831: avidvān kārakas tasmān na vidvāṃs tattvadarśanāt // MMK_26.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:833: avidyāyā nirodhas tu jñānasyāsyaiva bhāvanāt // MMK_26.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:834: tasya tasya nirodhena tat tan nābhipravartate /
T04nagmmk_u:836: abhūm atītam adhvānaṃ nābhūvam iti dṛṣṭayaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:837: yās tāḥ śāśvatalokādyāḥ pūrvāntaṃ samupāśritāḥ // MMK_27.1 //
T04nagmmk_u:840: abhūm atītam adhvānam ity etan nopapadyate /
T04nagmmk_u:841: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavaty ayam // MMK_27.3 //
T04nagmmk_u:842: sa evātmeti tu bhaved upādānaṃ viśiṣyate /
T04nagmmk_u:843: upādānavinirmukta ātmā te katamaḥ punaḥ // MMK_27.4 //
T04nagmmk_u:845: syād upādānam evātmā nāsti cātmeti vaḥ punaḥ // MMK_27.5 //
T04nagmmk_u:846: na copādānam evātmā vyeti tat samudeti ca /
T04nagmmk_u:847: kathaṃ hi nāmopādānam upādātā bhaviṣyati // MMK_27.6 //
T04nagmmk_u:849: gṛhyeta hy anupādāno yady anyo na ca gṛhyate // MMK_27.7 //
T04nagmmk_u:850: evaṃ nānya upādānān na copādānam eva saḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:851: ātmā nāsty anupādāno nāpi nāsty eṣa niścayaḥ // MMK_27.8 //
T04nagmmk_u:852: nābhūm atītam adhvānam ity etan nopapadyate /
T04nagmmk_u:853: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu tato 'nyo na bhavaty ayam // MMK_27.9 //
T04nagmmk_u:854: yadi hy ayaṃ bhaved anyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet /
T04nagmmk_u:855: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhet tatra jāyeta cāmṛtaḥ // MMK_27.10 //
T04nagmmk_u:856: ucchedaḥ karmaṇāṃ nāśaḥ kṛtam anyena karma ca /
T04nagmmk_u:857: pratisaṃvedayed anya evam ādi prasajyate // MMK_27.11 //
T04nagmmk_u:858: nāpy abhūtvā samudbhūto doṣo hy atra prasajyate /
T04nagmmk_u:859: kṛtako vā bhaved ātmā saṃbhūto vāpy ahetukaḥ // MMK_27.12 //
T04nagmmk_u:860: evaṃ dṛṣtir atīte yā nābhūm aham abhūm aham /
T04nagmmk_u:861: ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti naiṣā samupapadyate // MMK_27.13 //
T04nagmmk_u:862: adhvany anāgate kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmīti darśanam /
T04nagmmk_u:863: na bhaviṣyāmi cety etad atītenādhvanā samam // MMK_27.14 //
T04nagmmk_u:864: sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaś ced evaṃ bhavati śāśvatam /
T04nagmmk_u:865: anutpannaś ca devaḥ syāj jāyate na hi śāśvatam // MMK_27.15 //
T04nagmmk_u:866: devād anyo manuṣyaś ced aśāśvatam ato bhavet /
T04nagmmk_u:867: devād anyo manuṣyaś cet saṃtatir nopapadyate // MMK_27.16 //
T04nagmmk_u:868: divyo yady ekadeśaḥ syād ekdeśaś ca mānuṣaḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:869: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavet tac ca na yujyate // MMK_27.17 //
T04nagmmk_u:870: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca prasiddham ubhayaṃ yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:871: siddhe na śāśvataṃ kāmaṃ naivāśāśvatam ity api // MMK_27.18 //
T04nagmmk_u:872: kutaścid āgataḥ kaścit kiṃcid gacchet punaḥ kva cit /
T04nagmmk_u:873: yadi tasmād anādis tu saṃsāraḥ syān na cāsti saḥ // MMK_27.19 //
T04nagmmk_u:874: nāsti cec chāśvataḥ kaścit ko bhaviṣyaty aśāśvataḥ /
T04nagmmk_u:875: śāśvato 'śāśvataś cāpi dvābhyām ābhyāṃ tiraskṛtaḥ // MMK_27.20 //
T04nagmmk_u:876: antavān yadi lokaḥ syāt paralokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
T04nagmmk_u:877: athāpy anantavāl lokaḥ paralokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // MMK_27.21 //
T04nagmmk_u:878: skandhānām eṣa saṃtāno yasmād dīpārciṣām iva /
T04nagmmk_u:879: tasmān nānantavattvaṃ ca nāntavattvaṃ ca yujyate // MMK_27.22 //
T04nagmmk_u:880: pūrve yadi ca bhajyerann utpadyeran na cāpy amī /
T04nagmmk_u:881: skandhāḥ skandhān pratītyemān atha loko 'ntavān bhavet // MMK_27.23 //
T04nagmmk_u:882: pūrve yadi na bhajyerann utpadyeran na cāpyamī /
T04nagmmk_u:883: skandhāḥ skandhān pratītyemāl loko 'nanto bhaved atha // MMK_27.24 //
T04nagmmk_u:884: antavān ekadeśaś ced ekadeśas tv anantavān /
T04nagmmk_u:885: syād antavān anantaś ca lokas tac ca na yujyate // MMK_27.25 //
T04nagmmk_u:887: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitan na yujyate // MMK_27.26 //
T04nagmmk_u:889: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśo naitad apy upapadyate // MMK_27.27 //
T04nagmmk_u:890: antavac cāpy anantaṃ ca prasiddham ubhayaṃ yadi /
T04nagmmk_u:891: siddhe naivāntavat kāmaṃ naivānantavad ity api // MMK_27.28 //
T04nagmmk_u:893: kva kasya katamāḥ kasmāt saṃbhaviṣyanti dṛṣṭayaḥ // MMK_27.29 //
T04nagmmk_u:895: anukampām upādāya taṃ namasyāmi gautamam // MMK_27.30 //
